DOC.brief_title: Left Atrial Appendage Closure With SentreHeart Lariat® Device
DOC.detailed_description: The study cohort consist 50 patient candidate LAA closure oral anticoagulation contraindicate . Subjects evaluate left atrial appendage closure screen inclusion consent prior procedure . If anatomy favorable placement Lariat® device , procedure perform one participating center . If anatomy favorable , patient exclude study manage use best care practice physician . Subjects consent tracked study team consider enrol study time start leave atrial appendage closure procedure . All subject consent undergo leave atrial appendage closure SentreHeart Lariat® consider screen failure . Any patient fail attempt leave atrial appendage closure SentreHeart Lariat® track index hospitalization safety ; study follow complete time discharge . The invasive procedure placement study device proceed accord standard interventional technique , already place participate center . Patients undergo Lariat® procedure administer colchicine 0.6 mg po twice daily minimum three day preoperatively , 30 day postoperatively . ( This dose may adjust renal function intolerance ) . Patients undergo follow-up visit 7 day , 90 day , 180 day post procedure .
